amendment.description: To eliminate funding for the Appalachian Regional Commission, the Delta Regional Authority, the Denali Commission, and the Northern Border Regional Commission.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3803 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 25 - 71. Record Vote Number: 56.

action.text: Amendment SA 3803 proposed by Senator Alexander for Senator Ernst to Amendment SA 3801. (consideration: CR S2320-2322; text: CR S2320) To eliminate funding for the Appalachian Regional Commission, the Delta Regional Authority, the Denali Commission, and the Northern Border Regional Commission.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3803 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 25 - 71. Record Vote Number: 56.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3803 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 25 - 71. Record Vote Number: 56.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3803 proposed by Senator Alexander for Senator Ernst to Amendment SA 3801.
